page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: In this block the farming concentrates on rearing livestock;cattle,sheep,and pigs.Some farmers have dairy herds,{ {FRIESIANS},but mostly the cattle are reared for beef.The grazing land is also used for sheep,the lambing season running from November until April.Pigs are kept in large modern buildings. There is a large modern poultry farm within the block.Modern farming methods have led to the removal of banks and hedgerows in order to allow the use of large machinery.This is particularly the case on the flat valley floor.Here grass is grown for silage,maize and root crops are grown for fodder.Wheat is also grown as a cash crop.There three orchards within the block.
